Traits.Name: Banish
Traits.Description: A character can disintegrate an adjacent defeated demon as an action, returning it to the void from which it came.

SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Demons do not flee or negotiate.

Actions.Name: Devour
Actions.Description: The Demon devours and absorbs an adjacent Natal or another defeated Demon, healing 25% hp. A Natal devoured this way is destroyed.
